[[inst_hl_sw_po]]
==== HL.SW.PO

*Syntax:* hl.sw.po SrcD, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<2], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sw_po.svg[HL.SW.PO encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/POST_INDEX
